_sText:
It is in the beta testing phase and
that will close soon that is why I need to get the
word out, the more eyes testing it the more polished I
can make it. 

Map Name: de_lochsBETA3
Release Date: 1/22/05 (Final version TBA)

Two bombsites, supports 32 players. Bombsite B is the
Fish ladder viewing area, bombsite A is the control
room. The basic idea behind the map is that there is a
town, vigville which has a set of lochs like the
pannama canal but smaller. Terrorist have targeted the
lochs because it is a vital part of
the vigville economy but is also a minor tourist
attraction. 

I did some custom textures for the map such as Larys
Lard Bar a snack bar that features fish bricks instead
of fish sticks =) The overall flow of the map is
really ballanced and everyone that has tested it so
far has liked it.

So download it, play it, let me know what you think.
If you think it is worth it to post news then so be
it.

Steam forum thread here:
http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?s=&threadid=231478
